title: Dispensing auto-injectable Epinephrine to schools (GDNA - Georgia Drugs and Narcotics Agency)
text: ( Source : GDNA - Georgia Drugs and Narcotics Agency ) During the 2013 Legislative Session , Georgia's law changed to allow pharmacists to fill auto-injectable Epinephrine prescriptions written by physicians, APRNs, and PAs in the nname of a
